00110 #include <iostream>
00120 class NT_vector3_o;
00121 
00122 extern NT_vector3_o& NT_UnitXVec3();
00123 extern NT_vector3_o& NT_UnitYVec3();
00124 extern NT_vector3_o& NT_UnitZVec3();
00125 extern NT_vector3_o& NT_UnitMinusZVec3();
00126 extern NT_vector3_o& NT_UnitXYZVec3();
00127 extern NT_vector3_o& NT_OriginVec3();  
00128 
00129 
00130 class NT_vector3_o : public NT_o {
00131 public:
00132     // NT_vector3_o components
00133     NTreal x,y,z;                         
00134 
00135   /* ***      CONSTRUCTORS          ***/
00136   NT_vector3_o() { x=y=z=0; }                   
00137   
00138   NT_vector3_o(NTreal pX, NTreal pY, NTreal pZ)
00139     : 
00140     x(pX), 
00141     y(pY), 
00142     z(pZ) 
00143     {
00144     }
00145 
00146   /* ***      COPY AND ASSIGNMENT   ***/
00147     NT_vector3_o(const NT_vector3_o & original)
00148     :
00149     x(original.x),
00150     y(original.y),
00151     z(original.z)
00152     {
00153     }
00154 
00155     const NT_vector3_o&  
00156     operator= (const NT_vector3_o & right)
00157     {
00158         if (this == &right) return *this; // Gracefully handle self assignment
00159         // add assignment code here
00160         x = right.x;
00161         y = right.y;
00162         z = right.z;
00163         return *this;
00164     }
00165 
00166 
00167     /* ***      DESTRUCTOR      ***/
00168     ~NT_vector3_o() 
00169     {
00170     }
00171 
00172  
00173   // NT_vector3_o arithmatic
00174   
00175   NT_vector3_o operator+(const NT_vector3_o & pV) const
00176   { NT_vector3_o out( x+pV.x, y+pV.y, z+pV.z ); return out; }
00177   
00178   NT_vector3_o operator-(const NT_vector3_o & pV) const
00179   { NT_vector3_o out( x-pV.x, y-pV.y, z-pV.z ); return out; }
00180   
00181   NT_vector3_o& operator+=(const NT_vector3_o & pV)
00182   { x+=pV.x; y+=pV.y; z+=pV.z; return *this; }
00183   
00184   NT_vector3_o& operator-=(const NT_vector3_o & pV)
00185   { x-=pV.x; y-=pV.y; z-=pV.z; return *this; }
00186 
00188   NT_vector3_o X(const NT_vector3_o & pV) const   
00189   { NT_vector3_o out( y*pV.z-z*pV.y, z*pV.x-x*pV.z, x*pV.y-y*pV.x ); 
00190   return out; }
00191 
00192  
00194 NTreal 
00195 operator()(NTint component) const
00196 { 
00197   NT_ASSERT_BOUNDS(component, 1, 3);
00198 switch (component){
00199     case 1:
00200         return x;
00201         break;
00202     case 2:
00203         return y;
00204         break;
00205     case 3:
00206         return z;
00207         break;
00208     default:
00209         return 0.0;
00210         break;
00211         }
00212 }
00213 
00214 
00216 NTreal &
00217 operator[](NTint component) 
00218 { 
00219  switch (component){
00220     case 0:
00221         return x;
00222         break;
00223     case 1:
00224         return y;
00225         break;
00226     case 2:
00227         return z;
00228         break;
00229     default:
00230         return x;
00231         break;  
00232         }
00233 }
00234 
00236 NTreal 
00237 operator[](NTint component) const
00238 { 
00239  switch (component){
00240     case 0:
00241         return x;
00242         break;
00243     case 1:
00244         return y;
00245         break;
00246     case 2:
00247         return z;
00248         break;
00249     default:
00250         return x;
00251         break;  
00252         }
00253 }
00254   
00255   NT_vector3_o Cross( const NT_vector3_o & pV ) const
00256   { return (*this).X(pV); }
00257 
00258   friend NT_vector3_o Cross( const NT_vector3_o & p1, const NT_vector3_o & p2 )
00259   { return p1.X(p2); }
00260 
00262   NTreal operator*(const NT_vector3_o & pV) const         
00263   { return x*pV.x + y*pV.y + z*pV.z; }
00264 
00265   NTreal Dot(const NT_vector3_o & pV) const
00266   { return (*this)*(pV);}   
00267 
00268   friend NTreal Dot( const NT_vector3_o & p1, const NT_vector3_o & p2 )
00269   { return p1 * p2; }
00270   
00272   NT_vector3_o operator*(const NTreal pR) const           
00273   { NT_vector3_o out( x*pR, y*pR, z*pR ); return out; }
00274 
00276   friend NT_vector3_o operator*(const NTreal pR, const NT_vector3_o pV)
00277   { NT_vector3_o out( pV.x*pR, pV.y*pR, pV.z*pR ); return out; }
00278   
00280   NT_vector3_o& operator*=(const NTreal pR)
00281   { x*=pR; y*=pR; z*=pR; return *this; }
00282 
00286   NT_vector3_o XYZrotation(const NT_vector3_o & rotV) const;
00287 
00288   
00290   NTreal LenSqr(void) const 
00291   { return x*x+y*y+z*z; }
00292   
00294   NTreal Length(void) const
00295   { return sqrt(LenSqr()); }
00296   
00300   void Norm()
00301   {
00302     NTreal tmpLen = Length();
00303     if (tmpLen > 0) {
00304         x /= tmpLen;
00305         y /= tmpLen;
00306         z /= tmpLen;
00307     }
00308   }
00309 
00311   NT_vector3_o Norm() const 
00312   { 
00313     NTreal tmpLen = Length();
00314     if (tmpLen > 0) return NT_vector3_o(x/tmpLen, y/tmpLen, z/tmpLen);
00315     else return NT_OriginVec3();
00316   }
00317     
00318 
00321   NT_vector3_o Proj(const NT_vector3_o & pV)
00322   { NT_vector3_o out( pV * (this->Dot(pV) / pV.LenSqr()) ); return out; }
00323   
00325   NTreal CosAng( const NT_vector3_o & pV)
00326   { return this->Dot(pV) / (Length() * pV.Length()); }
00327 
00328 
00329 NTreal 
00330 operator^(const NT_vector3_o & right)
00331 {
00332   return NT_SELF.CosAng(right);
00333 }
00334 
00335 
00336 
00341 NT_vector3_o 
00342 BaseVectorAngle() const
00343 {
00344   NT_vector3_o oDirection;
00345   for (NTuint ll=0; ll < 3; ll++){
00346     NT_vector3_o oUnit;
00347     oUnit[ll]=1.0;
00348     oDirection[ll] = oUnit^(*this);
00349   }
00350   return oDirection;
00351 }
00352 
00353 
00354 
00355 void 
00356 set_elem(const NTreal * elemVec)
00357 {
00358   x = elemVec[0];
00359   y = elemVec[1];
00360   z = elemVec[2];
00361 }
00362 
00364   NTuint _dimension() const{ return 3;}
00366   NTreal* _elem() const { NTreal * tmpPtr = new NTreal[3];
00367   tmpPtr[0] = x;tmpPtr[1] = y;tmpPtr[2] = z; return tmpPtr;}
00368   
00370   NTbool operator==( const NT_vector3_o & pV) const
00371   { return (x==pV.x && y==pV.y && z==pV.z) ? NT_TRUE: NT_FALSE; }
00372   
00373   NTbool operator!=( const NT_vector3_o & pV) const
00374   { return (x!=pV.x || y!=pV.y || z!=pV.z) ? NT_TRUE: NT_FALSE; }
00375 
00376 
00378   friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& pStr, const NT_vector3_o& pV)
00379   { return (pStr << '(' << pV.x << ',' << pV.y << ',' << pV.z << ')'); }
00380   
00382   friend istream& operator>>(istream pStr, NT_vector3_o& pV) 
00383         { return (pStr >> pV.x >> pV.y >> pV.z); }
00384 }   ;
